api.email.website.footer.mailToMessage:
This message was sent from Bridebook.com on behalf of {{name}} & {{partnerName}}.
Send replies to <0>{{email}} to respond.
emptyState.archived.descriptionArchive: Looking for older conversations? You’ll find your archived messages here. Simply unarchive them to bring them back to your active folders.
emptyState.archived.title: Archived messages
emptyState.guests.description: <0><0>Perfect for sharing updates, reminders, or important info with ease.</0><1></1><2><0>Add friends & family to your guest list</0><1>Collect email addresses by sharing<1> your unique link</1></1><2>Send your message!</2></2></0>
emptyState.guests.heading: Email your guests directly through Bridebook
emptyState.notifications.descriptionArch: We’ll share personalised tips and updates here to help you explore new features and get the very best out of Bridebook.
emptyState.notifications.title: Find out what’s new
emptyState.suppliers.description: When you message a venue or supplier through Bridebook, your conversation will appear here.
emptyState.suppliers.title: No messages yet
guestComms.redirectShareModal.text: Effortlessly share your wedding details—send RSVPs, updates, and your wedding website to guests in just a few clicks!
guestComms.redirectShareModal.title: Keep your guests informed
guests.addressCollectorBanner.title: Request emails and addresses in a snap!
guests.addressCollectorModal.description: Share your link with your guests, they’ll fill in their info and voila, your Guest List is updated!
guests.addressCollectorModal.title: Guest details collector
You've got a message draft in progress. You won’t be able to return to this draft once you leave this page.

guests.createMessageFlow.messageForm.mes: Add a personal message to your guests
Message must be less than {{maxLength}} characters
E.g. We're so excited to invite you to our wedding! It's happening on Date at Venue. Love, Your Names
guests.createMessageFlow.messageForm.sha: You haven’t set up your wedding website yet. <2>Create one first</2> to be able to attach it here.
Your wedding website is currently unpublished. Don’t forget to publish it so your guests can view it.
guests.createMessageFlow.messageForm.sub: Subject must be less than {{maxLength}} characters
E.g. You're invited to our big day!
guests.createMessageFlow.recipients.head: Select recipients
guests.createMessageFlow.sendTestEmailFo: See what your message will look like in your guests' inbox by sending a test email to yourself.
